backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Product, Order, Category, and OrderStatus types with CRUD operations for a stationery shop, including product management, order placement, and stock tracking using stable Maps and Sets.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module with a no-op `run` function that passes the canister state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two features—fixing the product fetch error in useQueries.ts and ensuring auto-seed logic in CatalogPage.tsx—to their relevant files, test IDs, and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Maa Gayatri Stationers' and mounting the React app at the `#root` div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for catalog (/), checkout (/checkout), and admin orders (/admin/orders), wrapped in CartProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-in sheet cart sidebar displaying cart items with quantity controls, per-item pricing, and a checkout navigation button; shows an empty state when the cart has no items.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with shop branding, quick navigation links, contact info, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, desktop/mobile navigation links, and a cart icon button with item count badge that opens a CartDrawer.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a Header, Footer, and a flex-column structure using TanStack Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/OrderRow.tsx: Collapsible order row for the admin orders view, displaying order details, status badge, and a dropdown to update order status via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card UI showing image, name, description, price, stock status, and an Add to Cart button that calls the provided onAddToCart callback.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart state (items, totals) and actions (add, remove, update quantity, clear) via a useReducer-based CartProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: TanStack Query hooks for fetching products and orders, and mutations for placing orders, updating order status, and seeding products via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Lato), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a saffron-cream-maroon OKLCH color palette as CSS custom properties for both light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays all orders sorted by timestamp, shows status count stats (pending/processing/dispatched/delivered), and renders each order via an OrderRow component with a refresh button.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Product catalog page with category tabs that fetches all products, auto-seeds data if none are found on first load, and renders product cards in a responsive grid with loading skeletons and error state.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page with a form (name, phone, address) that places an order via mutation, shows an order confirmation screen on success, and handles empty cart and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color palettes (saffron, maroon, cream, sidebar), Playfair Display/Lato font families, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features (fix product fetching, auto-seed logic) and a pending backend task (AR-2) to ensure getProducts returns frontend-compatible data for the Maa Gayatri Stationers app.
